header: Queslar Rewritten Dungeon Simulator BETA
bench_description: Drag fighters between bench and battle slots
number_of_battles: Number of battles
api_key: API Key
battle_formation_description: Click to edit • Drag to move/swap
snapshot_code_placeholder: Generated snapshot code will appear here
snapshot_code_tooltip: Click 'Create Snapshot' to generate a code for your current Battle Formation and Armory items. Share this code with others. Paste a code here and click 'Load Snapshot' to load a saved setup.
referral_text: If you haven't used one already, please consider using my
import_warning: This will override all fighters currently in the Battle Formation. Are you sure you want to continue?
dont_show_warning: Do not show this warning anymore
armory_description: Click on items to edit. Drag on fighter to equip.
number_of_battles_tooltip: When Verbose is active, only one battle will be shown
api_key_tooltip: You can find you own API key under Settings > PI
edit_fighter_tooltip: On the left column, insert the number of upgrades for each stats. On the right column, the final values of the Fighter Item
NO_TIERED_STATS_SELECTED: No tiered stats selected or level is 0.
Below All For App.js [This line using as: Below All For App.s [This line using as Comment]

class_descriptions.assassin: The assassin prioritises the back column first
class_descriptions.brawler: The brawler has 15% chance to attack twice
class_descriptions.hunter: The hunter attacks hits a row dealing 75% damage to every enemy fighter
class_descriptions.mage: The mage attacks hits a column dealing 50% damage to every enemy fighter
class_descriptions.priest: While alive the priest has a 10% chance to resurrect a random dead fighter on your team every round
class_descriptions.shadow_dancer: The shadow dancer has a 25% chance to evade an attack completely. After any dodge, the next attack deals 200% damage
class_descriptions.berserker: The berserker gains 25% damage for each 25% health lost. When below 25% health, berserker attacks cannot be dodged
class_descriptions.paladin: The paladin provides a 15% damage reduction aura to all allied fighters in the same column
class_descriptions.crusader: The crusader becomes more powerful as allies fall. Gains +20% to all stats for each dead ally
class_descriptions.sentinel: The sentinel protects weakened allies, intercepting all attacks against allies below 25% health
class_descriptions.bastion: Allies in adjacent position to the bastion gain +50% dodge and 25% damage reduction
